mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.price, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, s.title as subjectLevelOne, ss.title as subjectLevelTwo, t.name as teacherName, c.cover FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_course_description d ON c.id = d.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s ON c.subject_parent_id = s.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject ss ON c.subject_id = ss.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id WHERE c.id = #{couseId}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.price, c.lesson_num AS lessonNum, s.id AS subjectLevelOneId, s.title AS subjectLevelOne, ss.id AS subjectLevelTwoId, ss.title AS subjectLevelTwo, t.NAME AS teacherName, c.cover, c.buy_count AS buyCount, c.view_count AS viewCount, d.description, t.id AS teacherId, t.NAME AS teacherName, t.intro, t.avatar FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_course_description d ON c.id = d.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s ON c.subject_parent_id = s.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject ss ON c.subject_id = ss.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id WHERE c.id = #{couseId}
